data.eml:eml: Molecular phylogenetics of ponerine ants (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Ponerinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schmidt, Chris (2013): Molecular phylogenetics of ponerine ants (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Ponerinae). Zootaxa 3647 (2): 201-250, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3647.2.1
